block.name: WX Osmocom Sink/Source Gain Panel
block.make: #set $parent = $notebook() and 'self.%s.GetPage(%s)'%$notebook() or 'self' #set $win = '_%s_gain_panel'%$id $win = osmosdr.wx_gain_panel($(parent).GetWin(), self.$osmoobj) #if not $grid_pos() $(parent).Add($win) #else $(parent).GridAdd($win, $(', '.join(map(str, $grid_pos())))) #end if
